–û—Ç Murder at Midnight




"A game for all times." This expression, otlino suitable for this product from Valve, namely, the legendary series "Half-Life", it is also "Counter-Strike" - "Counter-Strike 1.6"
The game has many advantages, and not many minuses
I don‚Äôt want to talk a lot, so I‚Äôll say briefly about the main values ‚Äã‚Äãof the game.
1.Grafika.Here you can see the excellent graphics at the time of the game. For many users, this graphics does not cause any interest and even causes disgust. .
I can state with confidence, even with the graphics of 2004, the game never ceases to be excellent.
2. Community. Age category mostly exceeds 16+
3. Gameplay. In this series of Counter-Strike The best mechanics of shooting from all modern shooters (my opinion). Having mastered the mechanics of shooting in Counter-Strike 1.6, you can easily be given any other shooter (The presence of straight arms also matters)
Conclusion: Playing this game for more than 12 years and I don‚Äôt want to stop at this. At this stage in the development of 3D shooters, Counter-Strike 1.6 will never stand aside, that is, forgotten.
By Murder At Midnight.

What is Counter-Strike ?

Theres nothing much to say about this one, other that its a classic that kickstarted the competitive FPS scene, I loved playing it back in the day but today its dated and I would prefer going to CSGO, but still, I have respect for it and may even play more of it someday, who knows, Im completely up for it and I even feel I should go back to this one someday, I have nice memories from it and considering after all those years its still alive and well with a surprisingly big and dedicated playerbase, it just show how much this game have managed to hold people into it, its such a classic game that no matter what its always a good time to return to even years later.
